Application Description: ITIL provides standardized change control to minimize disruption and risk during IT changes.
Failure Scenario: Unauthorized system updates result in system outages and downtime.
Corrective Application: Implement change advisory board (CAB) review and documented change requests.

Application Description: COBIT DS8 outlines managed changes to minimize the impact on services and operations.
Failure Scenario: Changes made without adequate controls lead to compliance failures and system instability.
Corrective Application: Apply formal change management process with approval gates and impact assessments.

Application Description: DAMA-DMBOK outlines principles for ensuring data accuracy, completeness, and consistency.
Failure Scenario: Critical reports contain incorrect or outdated data, leading to poor decision-making.
Corrective Application: Establish data profiling and monitoring processes with regular quality audits.

Application Description: SOX enforces internal controls to ensure accurate financial data reporting.
Failure Scenario: Material misstatements in financial reports due to inaccurate source data.
Corrective Application: Implement internal control audits and segregate duties in data access and entry.

Application Description: NIST SP 800-53 enforces role-based access control to safeguard information systems.
Failure Scenario: Unrestricted access results in data breaches or unauthorized data manipulation.
Corrective Application: Define and enforce access control lists and multi-factor authentication.

Application Description: ISO 31000 provides principles and guidelines for enterprise risk management.
Failure Scenario: Undetected risks lead to system failures, regulatory breaches, or data loss.
Corrective Application: Implement enterprise risk assessments and continuous monitoring processes.

Application Description: NERC CIP-007 requires monitoring of system activity and protection of log integrity.
Failure Scenario: Insufficient logging fails to detect cybersecurity events or intrusions.
Corrective Application: Deploy centralized log collection with retention policies and review procedures.

Application Description: ITIL tracks and controls IT assets through the configuration management database (CMDB).
Failure Scenario: Inaccurate asset records lead to misinformed change decisions and downtime.
Corrective Application: Maintain an up-to-date CMDB with discovery tools and periodic audits.

Application Description: SOX mandates division of responsibilities to reduce the risk of fraud.
Failure Scenario: Single user has authority to create and approve financial transactions.
Corrective Application: Implement role separation in financial systems and approval workflows.

Application Description: NIST enforces limiting access rights to the minimum required for job functions.
Failure Scenario: Users with excessive privileges unintentionally or maliciously alter systems.
Corrective Application: Regularly review and restrict access rights according to job roles.

Application Description: DAMA-DMBOK defines core functions of enterprise data governance and architecture.
Failure Scenario: Lack of standards causes inconsistent definitions and system silos.
Corrective Application: Adopt common data models and enterprise metadata standards.

Application Description: DAMA-DMBOK emphasizes accountability for data quality and policy enforcement.
Failure Scenario: No designated data owners leads to quality degradation and unclear accountability.
Corrective Application: Assign stewardship roles and responsibilities aligned to business functions.

Application Description: ISO/IEC 38505 provides guidance for ethical use of data in decision-making.
Failure Scenario: Misuse of personal data results in reputational damage and legal consequences.
Corrective Application: Implement ethical review processes and transparent data usage policies.

Application Description: FAA defines roles for IT workforce competence, security training, and access control.
Failure Scenario: Inadequately trained personnel introduce security vulnerabilities.
Corrective Application: Provide annual security training and certification validation.

Application Description: COBIT promotes alignment of IT goals with enterprise objectives through value delivery.
Failure Scenario: IT projects fail to support business strategy or improve outcomes.
Corrective Application: Define and track IT value metrics tied to business KPIs.

Application Description: Annex 19 establishes the Safety Management System (SMS) for identifying and mitigating aviation risks.
Failure Scenario: Failure to identify operational risks leads to preventable accidents.
Corrective Application: Implement proactive risk assessments and continuous safety performance monitoring.

Application Description: DO-326A addresses cybersecurity design assurance for airborne systems and equipment.
Failure Scenario: Unauthorized firmware or hardware changes introduce exploitable vulnerabilities.
Corrective Application: Establish secure baseline configurations and audit trail validation for avionics systems.

Application Description: FERC requires logging and retention of key operational records for regulated entities.
Failure Scenario: Missing audit logs compromise forensic investigations and regulatory reviews.
Corrective Application: Enforce long-term audit logging practices with retention and access controls.

Application Description: NERC CIP-005 and CIP-007 regulate electronic access to critical cyber assets in the energy sector.
Failure Scenario: Unauthorized access to control systems causes disruptions to critical infrastructure.
Corrective Application: Deploy role-based access controls and intrusion detection at electronic security perimeters.

Application Description: FAA defines data governance roles and responsibilities to support safety oversight functions.
Failure Scenario: Lack of structured data ownership results in inconsistent safety oversight reporting.
Corrective Application: Assign accountable data stewards and implement data lifecycle standards.

Application Description: Encourages voluntary compliance and ethical responsibility to disclose and correct safety issues.
Failure Scenario: Operators conceal violations leading to enforcement actions and safety threats.
Corrective Application: Promote a just culture with non-punitive self-reporting and cooperative risk resolution.
